transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Good afternoon sir.
Customer: Bataye.
Executive: Uh, Sandhya baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART head office se, senior manager.
Customer: IndiaMART, haan ji bataye.
Executive: Haan ji. Sir, actually kal aapka discussion hua tha Sarthak ke saath regarding your catalog services ke liye, right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To aap mujhe batayenge aapko services mein kya problem aa rahi hai, so that main us cheez ko aapko thoda help kar paun?
Customer: Madam, abhi to is samay se samay nahi de paunga, main kahin baitha hua hun. Lekin main mota se chota sa ek idea de deta hun. Actually jo uh, woh hai na, zyadatar inquiries jo aati hai na, woh saari keval hai na.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Client ke questionaires hain keval. Ki jo newly attached hue hain IndiaMART pe. Unka concern ye hota hai ki product kaise banta hai, kya banta hai, hamein 100 dibbe chahiye.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: De doge? Aur inquiry puch ke woh khatam ho jaati hai. Woh actual mein, haan, woh actual mein woh bande hain hi nahi jinko maal kharidna hai. Woh woh bande hain jinko hai na product ke baare mein bas jaanna hai.
Executive: Khatam ho jaati hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai na?
Customer: To aur woh bahut chhote chhote si quantity wale hote hain, 100-150 wale. Aur to ye is tarah ke issues hain uske andar.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Just an inquiry ke liye aapke paas aa raha hai, sirf confirm matlab puchne ke liye kitna pricing hai, kya hai?
Customer: Pricing bhi nahi, woh matlab unke generally hota hai ki generally starter start kara hai abhi. Aur sir hamein to 50 dibbe chahiye, hamein 20 de dijiye. Ab plant laga rahe hain, 20 dibbe hum denge, hamara ek baar ke productions kam se kam 2 se 5000 nikalta hai. To usme 20 se 40 kilo paper kharab hota hai. Ab kisi ka 20 dibbe banayenge to aap khud socho.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To matlab just ek retail ki tarah kaam ho raha hai isme.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: To woh issues hain. Dusri cheez ki matlab kuch ho nahi pa raha, matlab jitne din ho gaye. Abhi jo hamare paas jitne bhi orders hain woh hum door to door jaake hi hum le pa rahe hain apne links se.
Executive: Online aap nahi kar pa rahe.
Customer: Nahi ho pata.
Executive: IndiaMART ke through nahi ho pa rahe, right?
Customer: Nahi ho pa raha, nahi ho pa raha.
Executive: Theek hai, main aapka na profile ek bar closely monitor karti hun sir, kahan par kya problem aa rahi hai. And I will try ki main aapko buyleads wagera aapke profile pe share karwana start karun team ke saath, theek hai? Hum ek connect mein rehte hain so that aapka matlab jo bhi leads se related problem hai woh thoda solve ho. Waise kuch leads aapke paas jaise aa bhi rakhi hai sir, IndiaMART se. To aap mujhe batayenge aap local area mein deal karte hain woh all over India aap deal kar sakte hain?
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Local, local, local hai.
Executive: Local.
Executive: Achha, aapka preference local hi rahega.
Customer: Uska reason hai thoda sa. Reason ye hai paper paper core ke boxes bante hain to uska hai na costing bahut zyada nahi aati. To usme kya hai ki isme se zyada transportation lag jaata hai. To har koi jo door baitha hai na woh apne aas paas se kharidna chahta hai.
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay, okay.
Customer: Theek hai na? Kyunki woh door se kharidna.
Executive: Aur minimum order quantity?
Customer: Minimum order quantity minimum 2000 to hona hi chahiye.
Executive: Local mein matlab aapka pura NCR to cover hota hoga na sir?
Customer: Haan, haan, haan, haan, haan.
Executive: NCR to cover hota hoga aapka pura?
Customer: NCR se zyada hota hai. Haryana mein plant hai ye Sonipat mein, Delhi cover hota hai, Ghaziabad, Noida, Greater Noida. Theek hai, Haryana pura Rohtak-Wohtak sara Punjab, ye sara area Uttar Pradesh ke bhi aas paas ke area cover hote hain, Meerut-Veerut sara.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: To jaise abhi aapke paas dekhiye Uttar Pradesh se aapke paas round paper box ka requirement aa rakha hai 3000 pieces ka. But ye Robertsganj ka hai sir. To ye aapke liye door padega kya?
Customer: Kahan se hai ye?
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: Kis jagah se hai?
Executive: Uh, Uttar Pradesh.
Customer: Nahi, Uttar Pradesh bahut bada hai. State bataye.
Executive: Uh, Robertsganj karke hai.
Customer: Robertsganj to koi jagah nahi hai.
Executive: Sir, search.
Customer: Robertsganj kya ho gaya?
Executive: Main aapko bata deti hun ye kahan pe hai Robertsganj. State nahi hai, Mirzapur division mein aata hai.
Customer: State ka naam bataye.
Customer: Mirzapur, haan, Mirzapur kaafi door padta hai, Rampur, Mirzapur door padega. Haan, ye hote hain.
Executive: Door padega.
Customer: Door padega aapko. Bahut zyada hai, UP bahut bada state hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Aur Delhi mein agar main baat karun to Delhi mein jaise aapke paas shuttlecock box ka aa rakha hai. Then 300 pieces paper tube box bhi aa rakhi hai.
Customer: Madam, aap ek kaam karo, main khud ek baar hai na fly karo. Aur phir dekhna in pe kitne response aate hain. Main Delhi ke.
Executive: Paper.
Executive: Sir, hamare paas options hain.
Customer: Nahi, main general bata raha hun. Main daily ke daily hai na, pehle to teen-teen mujhe bataya tha, main teen-teen daily kar raha tha. Main call bhi karta tha, 15-15, 20 minute bande kha jaate hain, theek hai? To woh ho nahi pa raha. Hota nahi hai usme. Ichchuk nahi hai. Matlab khel bana rakha hai logon ne.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Humse meeting bhi kar lete hain, humse meeting karte hain, road pe aa jaate hain, meeting karte hain. Kehte hain yaar humne hai na ye product banaya hai abhi. Aur sir hum bhi starter hain, bade ho jayenge aapko order denge. Are yaar bada ya chhota kya hota hai?
Executive: Main samajh gayi.
Executive: Bada, sahi baat hai, sahi baat hai.
Customer: Theek hai na? Jab hoga jab bada ka bada dekhenge, abhi jo hai woh dekhenge na yaar. Pata nahi hoga nahi hoga, kyunki starter aap bhi jaante ho kayi lakh khulte hain usme se kuch.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Kuch chalte hain, sab, sab nahi chalte hain, haan, correct, correct.
Executive: Lagbhag saare band hote hain. Aisa thodi na, aajkal to aap bhi jaante ho ghar ghar mein log hai na namkeene bechne ki packing banaye baithe hain. Hain, agar bata rahe hain, theek hai?
Customer: Correct.
Executive: Sahi baat hai.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Ghar ghar mein unhone khol rakhe hain, dusre se kharid rahe hain, apni packing marte hain, thappa marte hain ji hum bana rahe hain, bech rahe hain. To woh wale kaam kar rahe hain. Ye sab cheeze hain. Woh issue hai na.
Executive: No problem sir, main ek bar monitor karti hun pura sara cheeze aapka, theek hai? Aur kuch leads se related main aapko WhatsApp pe share karti hun ki hum aapko leads wagera dete hain aapke product se related. To jo location aapne bataya main us location pe bhi thoda consider karte hain hum, theek hai?
Customer: Dekhiyega, kuch na kuch to gadbad hai.
Executive: Haan, woh main ek bar aapka profile check kar leti hun na, kahan par kya problem aa rahi hai. Hmm hmm. Pura profile dekhna rahega sir aapka. Category keywords wagera main ek bar dekhti hun kahan par kya issue hai. To hum usko thoda theek kar dete hain aapka, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm, theek hai.
Executive: Haan ji. Remaining aapka koi aur concern hai isse related?
Customer: Nahi madam, isme hai na round shape ke hi hum box banate hain aur main kayi bar dekhta hun usme plastic box ke bhi add aa rahe hote hain. Aur square wale ke bhi aate hain to woh sab nahi chahiye, kachra nahi chahiye. Jo hamara kaam hai bas hamein wohi chahiye.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Dekhiye, add box ko uh, settings pe jaake not us pe dal dijiye na, not preferred category mein. To woh bilkul aana band ho jayega aapko sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aap settings mein jao, buylead preferences aata hai. Wahan pe category preferences aata hai, wahan pe not preferred mein aap plastic mein deal nahi karte ho, plastic dal dijiye. Aur dusra jo bhi aapne mujhe bola woh aap dal do. To usse related leads aana bilkul band ho jayega aapko.
Customer: Theek hai madam.
Executive: Hai na? Agar aapko uske liye guidance chahiye to main aapko guide kar dungi.
Customer: Kar dijiyega ya piche se daliega, mere paas is samay to main bahar hi hun.
Executive: Sir, abhi nahi, matlab main to nahi kar sakti hun kyunki mere end se to cheeze disabled rehti hain. Woh aapke end se hi hote hain aapke profile mein se. Woh mere end changes nahi hoenge.
Customer: Theek hai madam.
Executive: Theek hai. Kal aapne usme not satisfied karke diya tha sir, to abhi main.
Customer: Aapko not satisfied nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm. To main samajh gayi isiliye main aapko call. To abhi main aapka jo matlab not satisfied ke liye.
Customer: Aapki aawaz chali gayi.
Executive: Aur same. Main bol rahi hun sir, jo not satisfied aapne diya tha, to woh concern main aapka close kar dun?
Customer: Madam, jab tak mera purpose hi solve nahi ho raha to main kaise satisfied ho jaunga? Aap apne woh dekhte hain.
Executive: Understood sir, but uske liye maine aapko bola ki I will monitor each and everything main aapko ek bar pura week hum.
Customer: Woh to theek hai, par haan, pehle aap brief kar dijiyega uske baad hi.
Executive: Sir, uske liye mujhe time lagega na? Like hum pura week aapko pura aapka profile ek bar dekhte hain, aapko main leads dena start karti hun. One week ke baad main I will give a follow up.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: I will give a follow up sir. Sir, phir isko open rakhne ka sense nahi banta hai na kuch ki main isko open rakhun?
Customer: Dekho, jabardasti kuch bhi karna chahte ho to aap kar lijiye, baki nahi.
Executive: Nahi sir, without your consent main jabardasti to nahi kar sakti hun na.
Customer: To phir aap meri command nahi le rahe na aap. Main jo bol raha hun aap kar kahan rahe? Aap to ye bol rahe hain na ki pehle week chalega. Are pehle ho to jaye uske baad kar lena. Par abhi to main nahi chahta hun, main satisfied nahi hun, haan.
Executive: Theek hai sir, no issue.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai, no issue, main kar leti hun, haan ji.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Receives client questionnaires, not sales leads.

- Receives small quantity orders.

- Unable to get orders through IndiaMART.

- Receives irrelevant plastic box inquiries.



Resolution:

- Executive will monitor the customer's profile.

- Executive will share buyleads on WhatsApp.

- Executive will check profile for issues.

- Executive suggested using 'not preferred category' setting.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will follow up after one week.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, profile, settings, inquiries, orders
